49-year-old.context: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s.

bilateral internal nasal valve collapse.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor. There is also evidence of bilateral internal as well as external nasal valve collapse.

bilateral external nasal valve collapse.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor. There is also evidence of bilateral internal as well as external nasal valve collapse.

repair of internal nasal valve collapse.context: Procedures: 2. Repair of internal nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage.

repair of bilateral external nasal valve.context: Procedures: 3. Repair of bilateral external nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage.

harvest of right auricular cartilage.context: Procedures: 4. Harvest of right auricular cartilage.

significantly deviated septum.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

postoperative changes.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

septal spur.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

bleeding.context: Indications: The risks and benefits of the procedure were discussed with him included but not limited to bleeding, infection, septal perforation, need for further surgeries, external deformity, and he desired to proceed with surgery.

infection.context: Indications: The risks and benefits of the procedure were discussed with him included but not limited to bleeding, infection, septal perforation, need for further surgeries, external deformity, and he desired to proceed with surgery.

septal perforation.context: Indications: The risks and benefits of the procedure were discussed with him included but not limited to bleeding, infection, septal perforation, need for further surgeries, external deformity, and he desired to proceed with surgery.

need for further surgeries.context: Indications: The risks and benefits of the procedure were discussed with him included but not limited to bleeding, infection, septal perforation, need for further surgeries, external deformity, and he desired to proceed with surgery.

external deformity.context: Indications: The risks and benefits of the procedure were discussed with him included but not limited to bleeding, infection, septal perforation, need for further surgeries, external deformity, and he desired to proceed with surgery.

Afrin-soaked pledgets.context: The nose was decongested using Afrin-soaked pledgets followed by the injection of % lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine in the submucoperichondrial planes bilaterally.

lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: The nose was decongested using Afrin-soaked pledgets followed by the injection of % lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine in the submucoperichondrial planes bilaterally.

hemitransfixion incision.context: A hemitransfixion incision was made on the left revealing a large septal spur consisting primarily down on the floor of the left nostril creating nearly a picture of the vestibular stenosis on the side.

osteotome.context: Very carefully, the mucoperichondrial flaps were elevated over this, and it was excised using an osteotome taking care to preserve the 1.5 cm dorsal and caudal strap of the nasal septum and keep it attached to the nasal spine.

postauricular incision.context: Postauricular incision using a #15 blade, the area of the submucoperichondrial plane was elevated in order to preserve the nice lining and identifiable portion of the cartilage taking care to preserve the ridge of the helix at all times.

Q-tip.context: There were no further abnormalities noted and everything appeared to be in nice position. Therefore, an external splint was placed after the application of Steri-Strips.

Steri-Strips.context: There were no further abnormalities noted and everything appeared to be in nice position. Therefore, an external splint was placed after the application of Steri-Strips.

external splint.context: There were no further abnormalities noted and everything appeared to be in nice position. Therefore, an external splint was placed after the application of Steri-Strips.

Doyle splints.context: Doyle splints were placed and secured down using a nylon suture.

nylon suture.context: Doyle splints were placed and secured down using a nylon suture.

1 liter of crystalloid fluid.context: Iv Fluids: Include a liter of crystalloid fluid.
